subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets have been victimized by defensive lapses in losing six of their last seven games. The latest blunders came Sunday afternoon, when the Yankees stormed to a 5-4 victory and swept the Mets.
snippet: The Mets have been victimized by defensive lapses in losing six of their last seven games. The latest blunders came Sunday afternoon, when the Yankees stormed to a 5-4 victory and swept the Mets.
